internal.content:
--- title: How to use description: How to use --- This site caters to three distinct users: product managers, designers, and developers. Each will have different paths for their journeys through the site. **Product managers** will gain insights into how adoption might work for their product. **Designers** will see more strategic design patterns across the whole of the canvas UI experience, while **developers** will review robust documentation to test and code their own experiences. Product managers can gain the knowledge they need from Elyra canvas by digging into the following:

1. Read the introduction describing Elyra found here.
2. Explore the design patterns found here.
3. Interact with the test harness found at http://ibm.biz/elyra-canvas.
4. Use this site to gauge adoption with your team and introduce the patterns and technology.

Designers can gain the knowledge they need from Elyra canvas by digging into the following:

1. Read the introduction describing Elyra found here.
2. Explore the design patterns found here.
3. Interact with the test harness found at http://ibm.biz/elyra-canvas.
4. Download the Sketch document (coming soon) to begin acclimating to the Elyra shell.

Developers can gain the knowledge they need from Elyra canvas by digging into the following:

1. Read the introduction describing Elyra found here.
2. Install Elyra.
3. Interact with the test harness found at http://ibm.biz/elyra-canvas.
4. Read through the documentation found in the Common canvas and Common properties sections.

### Contact information | Discipline | Contact | | | -------- | --------- | ---------- | | **General questions** | Slack | https://ibm-analytics.slack.com/archives/C598XEX8S | | **Product management** | Mathew Mathew | [mrmathew@us.ibm.com](mailto:mrmathew@us.ibm.com) | | **Architecture (Properties)** | Matthew Howard | [mwhoward@us.ibm.com](mailto:mwhoward@us.ibm.com) | | **Architecture (Canvas)** | Craig Tomlyn | [tomlyn@us.ibm.com](mailto:tomlyn@us.ibm.com) | | **Design** | Devin O'Bryan | [dsobryan@us.ibm.com](mailto:dsobryan@us.ibm.com) | | **Development** | Vlad Bunescu | [vbunesc@us.ibm.com](mailto:vbunesc@us.ibm.com )
